page.title: 10FARMING _SHERIFFSTON FARM
page.content:
{Crops}Report Spring:Barley planted, only arable grown. Best seed is malting barley, used in distilleries for making whisky, then used as cattle cake. Summer/Average annual yield is 1\-2 Autumn:tons of barley for each 25-acre field.1983 was a very good year
A typical{day's work}in summer is a) inspect the outside cattle b) drive out muck c) mend fencing d) clean drains e) spray crops
Machines have made the farmer's life easier, but still Mr Shaw prefers cattle work to field work. Man-hours depend on essential work, whatever the the weather_a full and satisfying life
